about.details:
Incorporated in October 2002, Benchmark Computer Solutions Limited is a technology consulting and software development company specializing in IT infrastructure solutions.

The company provides IT infrastructure solutions, software and web-based application development services, annual maintenance contracts (AMC) and facility management services (FMS).

The company's core business is divided into three segments:-

  • IT infrastructure solutions
  • Software and web-based application development
  • Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC) and Facility Management Services (FMS)

Benchmark provides end-to-end technology-related services, including IT infrastructure and software development services. The company provides service models such as IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service) and SaaS (Software as a Service). The company has partnerships with various OEMs, including HP (via the HP Amplify Membership Program), SafeAeon (SafeAeon Partner Ecosystem Program), Veeam, Vertiv, Lenovo, Konica Minolta Business Solutions and Dell Technologies.


Benchmark Computer Solutions recorded total income from operations of Rs. 1,297.65 lacs, Rs. 3,194.69 lacs and Rs. 1,864.32 lacs for the period ended September 30, 2023 and for the financial years 2022-23 and 2021-22, respectively.

faqs.question: What is the Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 1854000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹66 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 14, 2023, and closes on December 18, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO opens on December 14, 2023 and closes on December 18, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 19, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 20, 2023. Check the Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Benchmark Computer Solutions IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 21, 2023.
